section.title: Description
section.p: "Defines the volume measurement in which the drug strength concentration is contained. For example, Acetaminophen 120 MG/5ML Elixir means that 120 MG of the drug is in a solution with a volume of 5 ML." - HL7 Version 2.8, RXO-25.

stentry.p: "Defines the volume measurement in which the drug strength concentration is contained. For example, Acetaminophen 120 MG/5ML Elixir means that 120 MG of the drug is in a solution with a volume of 5 ML." - HL7 Version 2.8, RXO-25.
"Indicates the volumetric unit associated with [Drug Strength Volume]." - HL7 Version 2.8, RXO-26.
Identifies the medicinal product used as a vehicle in a locally manufactured product.
